item.title: Starting a homelab for kubernetes development
item.description: The problem Local development environments are full of tradeoffs. Do you optimize for ease of installation, or “production” environment fidelity? Do you seed a subset of your production data for testing, or do you generate random datasets? Should it each service(persistence, api, batch) in the application be optional when developing new features? If you’re like me, these considerations are often a stumbling block on the path to a working prototype.
